articles.title: Missed Fists: Light heavyweight mismatch goes exactly as expected, more
articles.description: MMA Fighting’s Alexander K. Lee takes a look back at recent overlooked battles, including a completely predictable amateur bout, thrilling finishes from Russia, Kazakhstan, and Argentina, MMA in its purest form, and more!
articles.content:
Welcome to the latest edition of Missed Fists where we shine a light on fights from across the globe that may have been overlooked in these hectic times where it seems like there’s an MMA show every other day.

articles.title: Argentina's largest province to restructure $7 bln debt after long negotiation
articles.description: Argentina's largest province is set on Friday to wrap up its $7 billion restructuring of foreign currency bonds after more than 16 months of negotiations.
articles.content:
NEW YORK, Aug 27 (Reuters) - Argentina’s largest province is set on Friday to wrap up its $7 billion restructuring of foreign currency bonds after more than 16 months of negotiations.
The Buenos Aires province said it expected holders of at least 90%... [1376 chars]

articles.title: Dryness hits Argentine wheat but crop estimate unchanged - exchange
articles.description: BUENOS AIRES, Aug 26 (Reuters) - Dryness throughout Argentina's farm belt affected the development of wheat crops, the Buenos Aires Grains Exchange said in its weekly report on Thursday, but the damage was not enough for it to cut its 19 million tonne harvest estimate.The South American grains powerhouse is a major international wheat supplier, primarily to neighboring

articles.title: Everton beaten to signing of versatile forward by Italian giant
articles.description: Everton have lost out to Inter Milan in the race for an Argentina international who bagged 11 goals in all competitions last term.
articles.content:
Everton have today lost out to Serie A champions Inter Milan in the race for a versatile forward.

articles.title: Soccer-Inter sign Argentina forward Correa from Lazio
articles.description: Inter Milan have signed Argentina forward Joaquin Correa on an initial loan deal from Lazio with an obligation to make the transfer permanent, the two Serie A clubs announced on Thursday.
